src:
Statistik Arsenal vs Wolves: Meriam London yang Malu-malu Menembak
04 Nov 2019, 00:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sudah tiga pekan Arsenal menutup sebuah pertandingan tanpa menuai poin penuh. Terakhir, skuat besutan Unai Emery tersebut meraih hasil imbang kala bertemu Wolverhampton.
Pertemuan antara Arsenal dengan Wolverhampton terjadi di laga pekan ke-11 Premier League, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Bermain di Emirates Stadium, the Gunners hanya mampu mengantongi kedudukan imbang 1-1.
Awalnya, mereka sempat unggul lebih dulu melalui aksi Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang di menit ke-21. Arsenal coba menambah keunggulan dan unggul penguasaan bola, namun sayangnya malah kebobolan oleh gol Raul Jimenez pada menit ke-76.
Pada laga kali ini, si Meriam London tersebut tampak malu-malu untuk melepaskan tembakan ke arah gawang lawan. Informasi selengkapnya yang disadur dari BBC Sport bisa Bolaneters simak di bawah ini.
text:
Arsenal vs Wolves Statistics: London Cannons Shy in Shooting
Nov 04 2019, 00:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal have closed a match for three weeks without reaping full points. Finally, the Unai Emery squad won a draw when they met Wolverhampton.
The meeting between Arsenal and Wolverhampton took place in the Week 11 Premier League match on Saturday (11/02/2019). Playing at the Emirates Stadium, the Gunners were only able to pocket a 1-1 draw.
Initially, they had superior first through the action of Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang in the 21st minute. Arsenal tried to increase the advantage and superior control of the ball, but unfortunately even conceded by Raul Jimenez's goal in the 76th minute.
In this match, the London Cannon looked shy to open fire at the opponent's goal. Complete information extracted from BBC Sport can be seen below.
